QuestData.Title: Show of Storm
QuestData.Description:
<Watu stands up easily, as if his injury was gone.>
I--I--I stuck the shard into myself. Nothing hurts anymore. I feel good. Great. Immense.
Olekk still isn't back. Something must have gone awry. He should have never gone without me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Regroup with Watu in the Sagecrest Pines.
